name: Contact (itch) (fas3studios)
description:
Sometimes life becomes an endless cycle, that makes you fall deeper into a loop that seems to never change, and everything around you stops mattering. Sometimes, all you need is small changes, small steps.

===========================================================

CONTROLS

===========================================================

W A S D - Movement.

E - To pick up.

Esc- To open menu.

Break out of the loop
